leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

queries: [WEB] open ephys gui plugins list github
[WEB] low latency brain computer interface library github

tools.name: Miniscope-DAQ-QT-Software
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition software for Miniscope calcium imaging systems
tools.detailed_description: A QT-based software for streaming, recording, and controlling neural and behavioral data from freely behaving animals using the Miniscope platform. It handles real-time video streams and hardware control.

tools.name: MIES
tools.one_line_profile: Multichannel Igor Electrophysiology Suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive data acquisition and analysis environment for intracellular electrophysiology, built on top of IGOR Pro. It supports complex stimulus generation and multi-patch clamp recording.

tools.name: dynamic-foraging-task
tools.one_line_profile: Bonsai workflow for dynamic foraging behavioral tasks
tools.detailed_description: A workflow using Bonsai and Harp hardware for controlling dynamic foraging experiments. It includes a Python GUI for visualization and control of the behavioral task parameters.

tools.name: tracking-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Open Ephys GUI plugin for real-time animal tracking
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that enables real-time tracking of animal position using video input, synchronized with electrophysiological data.

tools.name: concore
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for closed-loop neuromodulation control
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for building closed-loop peripheral neuromodulation control systems, enabling real-time processing and feedback logic for neural interfaces.

tools.name: CyKit
tools.one_line_profile: Python server for streaming EEG data to clients
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based server application that interfaces with EEG hardware (like OpenBCI or Emotiv) to deliver neural data to web browsers or generic clients via TCP streams.

tools.name: MuseLSL2
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to stream Muse EEG signals via LSL
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight interface to stream and record EEG signals from Muse headbands using the Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) protocol, facilitating integration with other research software.

tools.name: Emotiv-LSL
tools.one_line_profile: Lab Streaming Layer support for EMOTIV Brainwear
tools.detailed_description: Provides support for streaming data from EMOTIV Brainwear devices using the Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) protocol, enabling synchronization with other experimental data streams.

tools.name: RTHybrid
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time neuron and synapse model library
tools.detailed_description: A library for building hybrid circuits with real-time neuron and synapse models, designed for electrophysiology experiments and dynamic clamp applications.

tools.name: happyFeat
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for BCI workflow in clinical applications
tools.detailed_description: A software framework designed to simplify the Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) workflow, particularly for feature extraction and classification in clinical settings.

tools.name: Acquipix
tools.one_line_profile: Neuropixels Acquisition toolbox for Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for acquiring and processing data from Neuropixels probes, facilitating integration into electrophysiology workflows.

tools.name: EyeTracker
tools.one_line_profile: Online pupil detection and eye tracking system
tools.detailed_description: A system for online pupil detection and video acquisition, featuring synchronization with SpikeGLX for electrophysiology experiments.

tools.name: pybci
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time BCI creation library using LSL and ML
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create real-time Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs) by leveraging Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) for data acquisition and standard ML libraries (PyTorch, SKLearn, TensorFlow) for classification.

tools.name: OpenEphys-PythonPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: Open Ephys plugin for Python integration
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that enables the insertion of custom Cython/Python code into the real-time signal processing chain.

tools.name: OpenBCI_GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform GUI for OpenBCI biosensing boards
tools.detailed_description: The official graphical user interface for visualizing, recording, and streaming data from OpenBCI Cyton and Ganglion biosensing boards.

tools.name: OpenBCI_GUI_Helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helper libraries for OpenBCI GUI
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions and utilities to support the development and operation of the OpenBCI GUI.

tools.name: BrainOn
tools.one_line_profile: Online BCI framework for feature modulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based online Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) framework designed for multi-threaded feature modulation and processing, enabling researchers to develop custom online experiments.

tools.name: RTXI-genicam
tools.one_line_profile: GenICam camera control module for RTXI
tools.detailed_description: A module for the Real-Time eXperiment Interface (RTXI) that allows control and data acquisition from GenICam-compliant cameras during electrophysiology experiments.

tools.name: RTXI
tools.one_line_profile: Real-Time eXperiment Interface
tools.detailed_description: A real-time Linux-based software system for hard real-time data acquisition and closed-loop control in biological experiments, particularly electrophysiology.

tools.name: bci-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for EEG acquisition and stimuli delivery
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for developing Brain-Computer Interfaces, handling EEG data acquisition, processing, and the delivery of visual or auditory stimuli.

tools.name: FrameGrabberPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: Video frame grabbing plugin for Open Ephys GUI to synchronize video with electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that allows capturing video frames from cameras and synchronizing them with electrophysiological data streams in real-time.

tools.name: RPiCameraPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: Open Ephys GUI plugin for controlling Raspberry Pi cameras
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys acquisition system that interfaces with and controls Raspberry Pi cameras for behavioral monitoring during electrophysiology experiments.

tools.name: bci-hil
tools.one_line_profile: Human-in-the-Loop research framework for Brain-Computer Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A research framework designed for Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) experiments involving human-in-the-loop paradigms, facilitating the development and testing of BCI applications.

tools.name: CatGT
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tool for SpikeGLX recordings including trigger shifting and artifact removal
tools.detailed_description: A C++ command-line tool for post-processing electrophysiology data acquired with SpikeGLX. It performs tasks such as trigger time shifting, common average referencing (CAR), and file concatenation/extraction.

tools.name: SpikeGLX
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance data acquisition system for Neuropixels and NI-DAQ probes
tools.detailed_description: A recording system GUI and backend designed for high-channel-count electrophysiology, specifically optimized for Neuropixels probes and National Instruments DAQ hardware.

tools.name: OpenBCI_GUI_PulseSensor
tools.one_line_profile: Modified OpenBCI GUI for Pulse Sensor optical heart rate monitoring
tools.detailed_description: A variation of the standard OpenBCI GUI tailored to interface with and visualize data from Pulse Sensor optical heart rate monitors alongside EEG data.

tools.name: Bonsai
tools.one_line_profile: Visual programming language for reactive data processing and experiment control
tools.detailed_description: A visual programming environment based on Rx (Reactive Extensions) for processing data streams in real-time. It is widely used in neuroscience for coordinating hardware, acquiring sensor data, and controlling closed-loop experiments.

tools.name: Bonsai - DeepLabCut
tools.one_line_profile: Bonsai interface for real-time pose estimation using DeepLabCut
tools.detailed_description: A Bonsai package that provides operators for running DeepLabCut models in real-time within Bonsai workflows, enabling closed-loop behavioral experiments based on pose estimation.

tools.name: Bonsai - Harp
tools.one_line_profile: Bonsai library for Harp hardware protocol data acquisition
tools.detailed_description: Provides Bonsai interfaces for acquiring data from and controlling devices that implement the Harp protocol, facilitating precise hardware synchronization in experiments.

tools.name: Bonsai - MachineLearning
tools.one_line_profile: Reactive infrastructure for machine learning within Bonsai
tools.detailed_description: A library for Bonsai that provides infrastructure for integrating machine learning models and inference into reactive data processing workflows.

tools.name: Bonsai - Python Scripting
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripting interface for Bonsai workflows
tools.detailed_description: Allows users to embed Python scripts and runtime within Bonsai workflows, enabling the use of Python libraries for data processing and logic alongside Bonsai's reactive operators.

tools.name: Bonsai - SLEAP
tools.one_line_profile: Bonsai interface for real-time multi-animal pose tracking using SLEAP
tools.detailed_description: A Bonsai package for integrating SLEAP (Social LEAP Estimates Animal Poses) models, allowing for real-time multi-animal pose tracking in experimental workflows.

tools.name: BonVision
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop visual environment generator for neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: An open-source visual environment generator built on Bonsai, designed for creating complex, closed-loop visual stimuli for behavioral neuroscience experiments.

tools.name: BRAND
tools.one_line_profile: Backend for Real-time Asynchronous Neural Decoding
tools.detailed_description: A backend system designed for real-time, asynchronous neural decoding, facilitating the development and deployment of Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) applications.

tools.name: BCPyElectrophys
tools.one_line_profile: Python modules for electrophysiology in BCI2000
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python modules designed to work with the BCPy2000 framework, enabling electrophysiological data processing and BCI application development in Python.

tools.name: bci2000web
tools.one_line_profile: WebSocket interface for controlling and streaming data from BCI2000
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools that enables web-based control and real-time data access from the BCI2000 system using WebSockets, allowing for browser-based BCI applications.

tools.name: P3Speller
tools.one_line_profile: P300 Speller application for BCI2000
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the P300 Speller paradigm for the BCI2000 system, used for brain-computer interface communication experiments.

tools.name: neuropixel-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for managing Neuropixel datasets and Kilosort results
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for handling Neuropixel electrophysiology datasets, including preprocessing, managing Kilosort spike sorting results, and data visualization.

tools.name: obci
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time processing for 2-photon calcium imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based system for low-latency, real-time processing of 2-photon calcium imaging data streams, specifically designed to interface with PrairieView software.

tools.name: PlotJuggler
tools.one_line_profile: Time series visualization tool for data streaming and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A fast and intuitive time series visualization tool often used in robotics and scientific research to visualize and analyze data streams from various sources (ROS, CSV, ULog, etc.).

tools.name: FALCON
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Analysis of LTE Control channels
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and tool for the analysis of LTE control channels, used in telecommunications research to decode and analyze cellular network signals.

tools.name: lsl-eego
tools.one_line_profile: LabStreamingLayer (LSL) driver for ANT Neuro eego devices
tools.detailed_description: A standalone application that interfaces ANT Neuro eego EEG amplifiers with the LabStreamingLayer (LSL) ecosystem, enabling real-time data streaming for research.

tools.name: OpenEphysLoader.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia tools to load data from Open Ephys GUI
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing functions to load and interact with electrophysiology data recorded using the Open Ephys GUI.

tools.name: ClosedLoop
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building closed-loop neurofeedback systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to facilitate the creation of closed-loop neurofeedback experiments, allowing for real-time processing of neural signals and feedback presentation.

tools.name: buffer_bci
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab/Octave framework for building Brain-Computer Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A simple framework based on the FieldTrip buffer for creating real-time Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI) in Matlab or Octave, supporting data acquisition and processing.

tools.name: bcisimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop BCI simulator for testing neural decoding algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool designed to test real-time neural decoding algorithms by simulating closed-loop Brain-Computer Interface scenarios without the need for live subjects.

tools.name: psychopy-lsl
tools.one_line_profile: LabStreamingLayer integration for PsychoPy
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables PsychoPy experiments to send and receive triggers and data streams via LabStreamingLayer (LSL), facilitating synchronization with EEG and other physiological signals.

tools.name: rteeg
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time EEG streaming and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for streaming and analyzing EEG data in real-time. Note: The repository suggests using MNE-Python for newer projects, but it remains a functional tool for specific workflows.

tools.name: App-AudioCapture
tools.one_line_profile: Audio streaming application for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: Official LabStreamingLayer application to capture system audio or microphone input and stream it over LSL for synchronization with physiological data.

tools.name: App-Gamepad
tools.one_line_profile: Gamepad input streamer for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: Official LabStreamingLayer application to stream analog stick positions and button events from gamepads (e.g., Xbox controllers) as LSL markers/signals.

tools.name: App-Input
tools.one_line_profile: Mouse and keyboard input streamer for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: Official LabStreamingLayer application to capture and stream mouse and keyboard events (keystrokes, movements) over LSL for behavioral analysis.

tools.name: App-SigVisualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time signal visualization for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: A PyQt5-based application for visualizing data streams (EEG, EMG, etc.) from LabStreamingLayer in real-time, useful for signal quality checks and monitoring.

tools.name: App-XDFStreamer
tools.one_line_profile: XDF file playback tool for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: Official application to replay signals stored in Extensible Data Format (XDF) as real-time LSL streams, enabling simulation and testing of real-time pipelines using recorded data.

tools.name: LSL4Unity
tools.one_line_profile: LabStreamingLayer integration for Unity3D
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper and integration toolkit for using LabStreamingLayer within Unity3D, enabling the creation of BCI games and VR experiments with synchronized physiological data.

tools.name: liblsl-Matlab
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab bindings for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: Official Matlab interface for LabStreamingLayer, allowing Matlab scripts to send and receive real-time data streams for online analysis and BCI implementation.

tools.name: plugin-UE4
tools.one_line_profile: LabStreamingLayer plugin for Unreal Engine 4
tools.detailed_description: Official plugin to integrate LabStreamingLayer with Unreal Engine 4, facilitating the development of high-fidelity VR/AR experiments with physiological data synchronization.

tools.name: pylsl
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for LabStreamingLayer
tools.detailed_description: The official Python interface to the LabStreamingLayer (LSL) library, enabling Python-based real-time data streaming, collection, and analysis pipelines.

tools.name: mne-cpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ framework for electrophysiology data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ framework for acquiring, processing, and visualizing electrophysiological data (EEG/MEG), offering real-time capabilities and cross-platform support.

tools.name: mne-lsl
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time brain signal streaming framework with MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that integrates MNE-Python with LabStreamingLayer (LSL) to provide a high-level interface for real-time brain signal streaming, processing, and visualization.

tools.name: Open Ephys GUI Binaries
tools.one_line_profile: Compiled binary distribution of the Open Ephys GUI for electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: Provides pre-compiled executable binaries for the Open Ephys GUI, a plugin-based software platform for multi-channel electrophysiology data acquisition and real-time processing.

tools.name: Neuropixels PXI Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Open Ephys GUI plugin for streaming data from Neuropixels probes
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that enables streaming and recording of neural data from Neuropixels probes via IMEC's PXI basestations and OneBox hardware.

tools.name: Open Ephys GUI (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Archived source code for the Open Ephys GUI data acquisition platform
tools.detailed_description: The legacy source code repository for the Open Ephys GUI. While superseded by the plugin-based architecture in newer repositories, it remains a reference for older electrophysiology data acquisition setups.

tools.name: Open Ephys Analysis Tools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB and Python tools for reading Open Ephys data formats
tools.detailed_description: A collection of archived scripts and functions for loading and analyzing data recorded with the Open Ephys GUI, primarily supporting the legacy Open Ephys data format.

tools.name: Bonsai.Onix
tools.one_line_profile: Bonsai library for the Open Ephys Onix acquisition system
tools.detailed_description: A library for the Bonsai visual reactive programming language that provides interfaces for the Open Ephys Onix hardware acquisition system, enabling real-time neural data processing workflows.

tools.name: Open Ephys Matlab Tools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for Open Ephys data and GUI interaction
tools.detailed_description: Official MATLAB tools for interacting with the Open Ephys GUI and loading recorded electrophysiology data, facilitating integration of Open Ephys into MATLAB-based analysis pipelines.

tools.name: Open Ephys Python Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Open Ephys data and GUI interaction
tools.detailed_description: Official Python package for loading data recorded by the Open Ephys GUI and communicating with the GUI via network events, supporting data analysis in Python environments.

tools.name: Open Ephys GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin-based platform for multichannel electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: The primary source code repository for the Open Ephys GUI, a plugin-based application for acquiring, processing, and visualizing extracellular electrophysiology data in real-time.

tools.name: OpenBCI Processing GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and processing software for OpenBCI hardware
tools.detailed_description: The legacy Processing-based GUI for OpenBCI biosensing hardware, used for visualizing EEG, EMG, and ECG signals and configuring the acquisition boards.

tools.name: LieSL
tools.one_line_profile: Library for processing LabStreamingLayer (LSL) streams
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to read, record, and process LabStreamingLayer (LSL) data streams on the fly, facilitating real-time neuroimaging and behavioral experiments.

tools.name: Reiz
tools.one_line_profile: Auditory and visual stimulus presentation with LSL synchronization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for presenting auditory and visual stimuli in neuroscience experiments, with built-in support for sending event markers via LabStreamingLayer (LSL) for synchronization.

tools.name: LabStreamingLayer (LSL)
tools.one_line_profile: Unified system for real-time measurement and synchronization of time-series data
tools.detailed_description: The main repository for LabStreamingLayer, a system for the unified collection of measurement time series in research experiments, handling networking, time-synchronization, and real-time access.

tools.name: CoBeL-RL
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop simulator for behavior and learning in neuroscience
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework for modeling complex behavior and learning in closed-loop environments using reinforcement learning and deep neural networks, tailored for computational neuroscience.

tools.name: Cleo
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop electrophysiology and optophysiology simulation testbed
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based simulation testbed for mesoscale neuroscience that integrates electrophysiology and optophysiology models to facilitate the development and testing of closed-loop control algorithms.

tools.name: AugmentedBCIFramework
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for P300-based Brain-Computer Interfaces
tools.detailed_description: An augmented Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) framework based on the P300 paradigm, including modules for acquiring eye gaze and physiological features alongside EEG.

tools.name: Thunder Streaming
tools.one_line_profile: Streaming analysis for large-scale neural data
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing streaming analysis on large-scale spatial-temporal neural data, enabling real-time processing of calcium imaging or electrophysiology datasets.

tools.name: Phase Calculator
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time phase estimator plugin for Open Ephys
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that estimates the continuous phase of neural oscillations in real-time, useful for phase-dependent stimulation experiments.

tools.name: Falcon
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for brushing and linking big data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization library designed for interactive exploration of large datasets through brushing and linking, often used in data science and scientific data analysis contexts.
